p: Analysis of the persistence interval of the constituents in the grains impregnated with A. mexicana essential oil (EO) showed a decrease of approximately 30% during the first 10 days and then remained relatively stable over the next 20 days. After this period, a new decrease was measured after which it produced a new fall, to reach a loss of 79.2% at the end of the experiment (day 49) ( Table 2).
